shiftRatings(List<T>, int, double, int) - Static method in class com.github.rjbx.rateraid.Rateraid
Increments or decrements an element of a List of Rateraid.Rateable by the specified magnitude while calibrating other List of Rateraid.Rateable elements to maintain proportionality to the whole within the range of the specified precision.
